import torch
import pickle
import sys

# Try to extract just the model weights by using a custom unpickler
class SafeUnpickler\(pickle.Unpickler\):
    def find_class\(self, module, name\):
        # Replace wandb config with a plain dict
        if ''wandb'' in module:
            return dict
        return super\(\).find_class\(module, name\)
